description: This file defines middleware for Express.js to authenticate requests using JWT Bearer tokens, extracting user info and attaching it to request object.

methods.name: requireAuth(req, res, next)
methods.description: Express middleware function that verifies JWT from Authorization header and attaches user info to req.user.

ctags.name: email
ctags.pattern: /^    req.user = { id: payload.sub, email: payload.email, name: payload.name };$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    req.user = { id: payload.sub, email: payload.email, name: payload.name };$/

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^    req.user = { id: payload.sub, email: payload.email, name: payload.name };$/

ctags.name: user
ctags.pattern: /^    req.user = { id: payload.sub, email: payload.email, name: payload.name };$/

fields.name: req.user = { id: payload.sub, email: payload.email, name: payload.name };
